item.title: Convergence: Understanding and Aligning Orchestration, Automation, NFV and SDN
item.description:
Convergence: Understanding and Aligning Orchestration, Automation, NFV and SDN

Looking at what is coming on the horizon for the next big leap in Computing and Network Automation
